items.title: Dick Morris to Newsmax: Democratic Party's Future Is Bleak
items.description: If current trends continue, there may not be a Democratic Party in the future, presidential adviser Dick Morris said on Newsmax Saturday.

items.title: Democrats Work to Counter Texas Redistricting Plan
items.description: Democrats across America are paying attention to a mostly Republican-controlled redistricting plan in Texas and looking at ways to counter the move.
